message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $18,000.  I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While I recognize your offer, the $18,000 price reflects the true value of this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to meet the $16,500 price point. Would it be possible for us to negotiate down to $15,000?
